message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you and the effort I've put into acquiring it.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to compromise and offer $11000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $11500. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer the product to you for $11400. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you and the effort I've put into acquiring it.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to compromise and offer $11200 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $11400. I'm willing to make another slight adjustment and offer the product to you for $11300. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you and the effort I've put into acquiring it.

I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price again, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to compromise and offer $11100 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you and the effort I've put into acquiring it.
